title: The Last Dragon Mage
imgSmText: A young woman discovers she is the last tamer of dragons.
imgText: In a world where dragons are nearly extinct, a humble stable hand learns she possesses the ancient magic to communicate with them and must save the last dragon egg.

title: The Sun Scorched
imgSmText: Survivors in a dystopian desert search for a mythical water source.
imgText: In a world turned to sand, a reluctant leader must guide her people across a deadly wasteland, hunted by sand wraiths, to find the fabled Oasis of Tears.

title: Whisper of the Depths
imgSmText: A mermaid princess must unite sea kingdoms against a leviathan.
imgText: An ancient leviathan awakens, threatening to devour the ocean kingdoms. A rebellious mermaid princess must forge an alliance between warring tribes to survive.

title: The Iron Oasis
imgSmText: A city of brass and steam survives in a magic-drained desert.
imgText: In a desert where magic has died, a resourceful engineer discovers a hidden power source that could save her city or attract the attention of a ruthless sand sorcerer.

title: The Glimmer
imgSmText: A boy finds a tiny, mischievous fairy with a dangerous secret.
imgText: A lonely boy discovers a wounded fairy, not knowing she is a banished royal from a dark, demonic court now hunting her to reclaim her destructive power.

title: The Sand Singer
imgSmText: A nomadic singer can command the desert sands with her voice.
imgText: The last of the Sand Singers, a woman who can manipulate the desert with her voice, must use her gift to protect her people from a empire that wants to control her.

title: The Crystal Hart
imgSmText: A girl bonds with a mystical stag whose antlers grow crystal flowers.
imgText: When loggers threaten her forest, a shy girl befriends the Crystal Hart, a magical creature whose power can heal the land, and together they must drive the invaders out.

title: Beneath the Silver Sea
imgSmText: An entire fantasy world exists in the reflection of a calm ocean.
imgText: A sailor falls through the surface of the sea into a inverted world where cities are built on the underside of the water and sky-squids swim through the air.

title: The Shadow Fae
imgSmText: A human is pulled into a war between light and dark fairy courts.
imgText: After stumbling into the hidden realm of the fae, a photographer is caught in a ancient conflict and must choose a side, discovering her own hidden magical lineage.

title: The Dune Riders
imgSmText: Taming giant desert worms is the only way to cross the Glass Wastes.
imgText: In the Glass Wastes, where the sand has turned to sharp shards, the only way to travel is on the backs of colossal sandworms. A young rider must tame the wildest worm of all.

title: The Moon-Feather Griffin
imgSmText: A griffin with feathers that glow like the moon is hunted for its power.
imgText: A hunter tasked with capturing a legendary Moon-Feather Griffin instead befriends the creature and must protect it from an evil alchemist who wants its feathers for a dark ritual.

title: The Sunken Library
imgSmText: A scholar dives to a magical library at the bottom of a lake.
imgText: The key to stopping a spreading blight lies in a library submerged by a forgotten spell. A scholar who can breathe underwater must decode its secrets before it sinks forever.

title: The Obsidian City
imgSmText: A thief steals a demon's heart in a city powered by captured magic.
imgText: In a dystopian city where magic is mined like a resource, a thief steals the heart of a powerful demon, accidentally binding it to her soul and gaining terrible power.

title: The Cloud Shepherd
imgSmText: A boy herds and shears clouds on the back of a flying woolly mammoth.
imgText: In the sky-lands, a young Cloud Shepherd collects rain and snow from his herd. When a storm dragon attacks, he must defend his peaceful way of life.

title: The Gilded Serpent
imgSmText: A desert spirit in the form of a snake grants wishes for a terrible price.
imgText: A lost traveler in the desert saves a golden serpent, who offers him three wishes. But each wish comes with a devastating consequence, forcing him to undo the magic.

title: Empire of Gods
imgSmText: In ancient Rome, a soldier learns the gods are real and speak through beasts.
imgText: A cynical soldier discovers he can hear the Roman gods speaking through animals. He must embrace this gift to prevent a mortal conspiracy from overthrowing the empire itself.

title: Frost Axe
imgSmText: A Viking warrior must unite clans against a mythical ice giant threat.
imgText: When an ancient frost giant awakens, a disgraced warrior is chosen by Odin's axe to unite the feuding Norse clans and save Midgard from a new ice age.

title: The Drakes of Sparkhaven
imgSmText: A young dragon learns to control his fiery sneezes with his family's help.
imgText: In a vibrant valley, a young dragon named Ember struggles with his unpredictable fire breath. With help from his family, he learns that his differences make him special.

title: Crown of Thorns
imgSmText: Two royal siblings wage a brutal war for their dying father's throne.
imgText: In a grimdark world, a dying king's decree ignites a savage civil war between his twin heirs. Loyalties are tested and monsters are unleashed in the fight for the Crown of Thorns.

title: The Iron Queen
imgSmText: A ruthless queen uses dark magic to crush a rebellion led by her cousin.
imgText: To maintain her absolute rule, a tyrannical queen forges a pact with a shadow demon. Her idealistic cousin must lead a bloody rebellion to free the kingdom from her dark reign.

title: Blood and Sand
imgSmText: Desert tribes battle an empire of stone men for control of a magic oasis.
imgText: The last water source in a vast desert is guarded by an ancient empire of living stone. A fierce tribal leader must unite the scattered clans to reclaim their ancestral home.

title: Pip's Folly
imgSmText: A well-meaning fairy's magic causes chaotic, unintended consequences.
imgText: A eager fairy tries to solve problems in her magical town with quick spells, but her solutions create hilarious chaos, teaching her that true help requires more than magic.

title: Kaelen's Current
imgSmText: An ancient sea turtle embarks on a journey to restore the dying ocean.
imgText: The ocean's magic is fading, and a young turtle discovers he is the last of the ancient current-riders. He must journey to the heart of the sea to awaken its slumbering spirit.

title: The Librarian's Map
imgSmText: A librarian finds a book that can rewrite reality, attracting dangerous foes.
imgText: A shy librarian discovers a magical atlas that allows them to alter the real world by drawing on its pages. But a sinister order wants the book to reshape reality to their will.

title: The Moonlight Weaver
imgSmText: A young woman discovers she can weave starlight into tangible forms.
imgText: An orphan seamstress learns she is the last of the Starlight Weavers. She must master her magic to create a cloak that can save her city from being engulf by eternal darkness.

title: The Golem's Heart
imgSmText: In a Prague ghetto, a rabbi's daughter brings a clay golem to life.
imgText: To protect her Jewish community from persecution, a rebellious young woman disobeys her rabbi father and animates a legendary clay guardian, with profound consequences.

title: The Last Griffin
imgSmText: A disgraced knight is chosen by the last griffin to be its rider.
imgText: Once a renowned knight, now a hermit, a man is sought out by the last griffin. Together, they must rebuild the ancient Griffin Rider order to face a forgotten evil.

title: The Clockwork City
imgSmText: A thief steals a key that winds the heart of a magical steampunk metropolis.
imgText: In a city powered by a single, magical clockwork heart, a thief steals the master key. She must decide whether to save the city or let it wind down and claim its treasures.

title: The Shadow Fox
imgSmText: A spirit fox must choose between its wild nature and a bond with a human girl.
imgText: A lonely girl saves an injured fox, not knowing it's a powerful spirit. Their friendship is tested when its dual nature forces a choice: protect her or embrace its chaotic power.

title: The Unseen University
imgSmText: A magical school exists in a pocket dimension, hidden from the modern world.
imgText: A non-magical boy stumbles upon a university for sorcery hidden within his own city. He must keep its secret while helping its eccentric students prepare for a magical exam.
